name: Nex
tagline: Minecraft Administration, Economy/Sign Shops, and Game Mechanics Plugin
body:
### Welcome Nex is an Administration, Economy / Sign Shops, and Game Mechanics plugin All-In-One. Disable which features you don't want via the configuration file, e.g if you wanted to disable the NexMechanics you could change the line "NexMechanics_Enabled = true" to "NexMechanics_Enabled = false" in the file "/Plugins/Nex/config.ini" ### Downloads * You can download the Nex Package which contains all of the Nex plugins by clicking "Download .zip file" or "Download .tar.gz file" on the right * PermissionsEx on bukkit * Latest version of Nex (Nex without any of its associated plugins) * SQLite and optionally SQLite Browser for viewing and editing the DB file. ### How It Works Nex uses a SQLite database to save player data, shop data, and anything else that might need saved. ### How To Use You aren't required to use all of the Nex plugins, but they work best together. To use any of the Nex plugins you need SQLite since Nex uses an SQLite DB to store all needed data. 1. Download the Nex Plugin 2. Place the plugin in /Server_Directory/Plugins/ 3. Run your server and Nex should automatically create a folder within your /Plugins/ folder, open it and edit the NexCore configuration file and the configuration file for whichever plugin(s) you downloaded. 4. Place the "server.db" file in /Plugins/Nex/ so it looks like "/Your_Server_Directory/Plugins/Nex/server.db" Your server should now be running successfully with Nex. To view and change data like sign shops, edit the "server.db" file. ### Permissions **NexCore** Ban Command * Nex.mb | Nex.hr | Nex.dy | Nex.wk Log Management * Nex.xraylogs.view | Nex.xraylogs.clear * Nex.stafflogs.view | Nex.stafflogs.clear NexSQL * Nex.db.new | Nex.db.add | Nex.db.del | Nex.db.wipe ### Nex Commands * ![bantime][mb|hr|dy|wk] [Player] [reason] !25mb testuser You're banned from the server for 25 minutes because you did not follow the rules.
!3dy testuser You're banned from the server for 3 days because you did not follow the rules.
!ban testuser You're permanently banned from the server because you did not follow the rules.
!xraylogs [view|clear] - View suspected x-ray users or clear out the x-ray logs from the DB.
!stafflogs [view|clear] - View suspected admin abusers or clear out the staff logs from the DB.
### NexSQL Commands * !db [wipe] [optional:table] - Wipe's the database or table clean. !db wipe testTbl (Would completely clear all rows from the table "testTbl")
!db wipe (Would completely clear all rows from all tables) * !db [new|add|del] [table_name] [args] !db new Players id(int),Username(string),Password(string) (Creates a new table "Players")
!db add Players 1,TestUsr,TestPwd123 (Adds a new row within the table "Players")
!db del Players Players 1 (Deletes a specific row from "Players" using only the ID specified)
### NexEco Commands Will be added soon. ### NexMechanics Commands Will be added soon.
